name: The Adventures of Oddley
storyline: In a city on the brink of ruin, where bustling streets were once alive with energy, now lies a semi-deserted wasteland choked by smog and despair. In "The Adventures of Oddley" a gripping adventure unfolds as Oddley takes on a mission that seems impossible: to save his beloved city from becoming an uninhabitable wasteland.
summary: Action, exploration, and endless surprises await in this all-new nonlinear RPG extravaganza! Roam a vibrant city brimming with secrets, quirky characters, and exciting challenges. Collect rare items, pogo, and chat with the locals—if you feel like it! Or blaze your own trail, ignoring the rules entirely. The choice is yours!
